title: Poster, "Kabaret", 1973
provenance: Acquired from dealers, galleries and auction houses by Marc Benda.  Remained with Benda until 2010, when gifted to CHNDM.
creditline: Gift of Sara and Marc Benda
description: On a scarlet-red field, is the image of four women's legs in black stockings and high heels, arranged in a Swastika, with a face of a heavily made-up screaming androgynous character in the center. The inscriptions are: on the black strip at the top, in white- "KABARET". On the red main field: at left- "Producja: Feurer and Martin", at right-"Amerycanski musical filmowy / nagrodzony 7 Oscarami", and at center- "Rezyseria / BOB FOSSE / W glownych rolach / LIZA MINELLI / Michael York / Joel Grey".
